# cook your dish here
n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
total = sum(arr)

count = 0
for i in range(n):
    if total - arr[i] == arr[i]:
        count += 1
        print(i+1, end=" ")
print()


def solve():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    total_sum = sum(a)

    s = set()
    for i in range(n):
        if total_sum - a[i] == a[i]:
            s.add(i+1)

    print(len(s))
    print(*s)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
solve()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# check if the array is good
if sum(a) - max(a) == max(a):
    print(1)
    print(a.index(max(a))+1)
else:
    print(0)


# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# check if the array is good
if sum(a) - max(a) == max(a):
    print(1)
    print(a.index(max(a)) + 1)
else:
    print(0)

"""
Good luck!
"""

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

total_sum = sum(a)

s = set()
for i in range(n):
	if total_sum - a[i] == a[i]:
		s.add(i+1)

print(len(s))
print(*s)
